description:
Ayumi’s popularity is driving Yuri crazy. Tired of not being the center of attention, Yuri competes with Ayumi in a fashion battle. The contest heats up when Yuri reveals that she’s a witch, too!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La présidente du BDE est-elle vraiment une sorcière ?
Magi? The Student Council President Is Also a Witch?
生徒会長も魔女ってマジですか?
